column6:
Cover by TIM BRADSTREET,2007,3
He took away their husbands, and they want payback. Five mob wives unveil their plan to take down the Punisher. But a new player moves onto the field -- one they hadn't anticipated. And she's got plans of her own.
32 PGS./Explicit Content ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | writer:Garth Ennis | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Lan Medina | inker:Bill Reinhold | colorist:Raul Trevino
